definition[0]: a repeated series of notes in popular or jazz music
definition[1]: a piece of speech in which someone talks about a subject in an entertaining way that does not seem planned
example[1]: He goes off on a riff about the problems of being middle-aged.
definition[2]: to play different notes related to the main tune in popular or jazz music
example[2]: He was riffing on his guitar.
definition[3]: to talk about a subject in an entertaining way that does not seem planned
example[3]: During her show, she riffs about everything from her family to global warming.
